pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional monitoring extensions that can extend the ZABBIX functionality. This modules written with BASH programming language and requires minimum dependencies.

use.flag: Facebook Flashcache monitoring extension get stats from /proc.
Glusterfs client monitoring, auto-discovery and check mountpoints.
Internal memcached stats through direct connection to the memcached.
PostgreSQL statistics based on pg_stat_* tables and other pg-related information.
Redis internal stats and raw data from redis storage via redis-cli.
Unicorn application memory usage, process and application reply.
Gathering information from SmartArray RAID controllers via hpacucli.
